title: Production Deployment Checklist
description: Pre-deployment checklist to ensure safe and successful production releases.

items.title: Review code changes
items.description: Perform code review and get necessary approvals

items.title: Run all tests
items.description: Ensure all unit, integration, and E2E tests pass

items.title: Update documentation
items.description: Update README, API docs, and changelog

items.title: Create backup
items.description: Backup database and critical data before deployment

items.title: Notify team members
items.description: Inform stakeholders about the upcoming deployment

items.title: Deploy to staging first
items.description: Test the deployment in staging environment

items.title: Verify monitoring and logging
items.description: Ensure monitoring dashboards and logs are working

items.title: Perform smoke tests
items.description: Run basic smoke tests after deployment

items.title: Update runbooks
items.description: Document any new procedures or changes
